changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_valult') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_valult GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_valult @id TINYINT, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @name NVARCHAR(12) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Guild_Vaults(id, guild_id, name) VALUES (@id, @guild_id, @name)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_valult') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_valult GO
